name: Engram
description: Repo-aware memory and impact analysis tool. Tracks code coupling, risks, and project notes using a libSQL backend.

tools.name: get_impact_analysis
tools.description: Analyzes a file to determine its coupling with other files and potential change risks based on commit history.

file_path.description: Relative path to the file in the repo

repo_root.description: Absolute path to the repository root

tools.name: save_project_note
tools.description: Saves a contextual note or 'memory' about a specific file in the project.

tools.name: read_project_notes
tools.description: Retrieves saved notes, optionally filtered by search query or specific file path.

tools.name: get_usage_metrics
tools.description: Provides repository-wide metrics including total analyses, risk distribution, and test intent extraction.
